title: Viratnagar Chronicles
subtitle: A tapestry of Myth, Mountains, and Monuments
tagline: Echoes of Mahabharata, Etched in Earth!
author: Team TEC

sections.heading: Overview
sections.content: Nestled in the Aravalli hills, Viratnagar (Bairat) is a treasure trove of history, mythology, and adventure...

subsections.title: Buddhist Archaeological Remains
subsections.content: Buddhist Chaityagriha remains include circular Stupa and adjoining Vihara...

subsections.title: Mahabharata Era Temples
subsections.content: Bhim Gatta cave stands out as a site deeply tied to the epic of the Mahabharata...

subsections.title: Prehistoric Rock Cave Art
subsections.content: Prehistoric cave paintings of Viratnagar are a fascinating window into early human life...

subsections.title: Ashokan Inscriptions
subsections.content: Two Ashokan rock edicts are among the few surviving examples...

subsections.title: Mughal Gate
subsections.content: The Mughal gateway stands like a historical pause between centuries...

subsections.title: Viratnagar Government Museum
subsections.content: The Viratnagar Museum offers a glimpse into the town’s ancient heritage...

subsections.title: Religious Temple Sites
subsections.content: Ganesh Giri Temple, Jain Nasiyan, and Hanuman Temple add spiritual richness to the region...

subsections.title: Village Life Experience
subsections.content: Discover the soul of Viratnagar in its vibrant villages...

subsections.title: Maharaja Sawai Man Singh II Museum
subsections.content: Located in the City Palace of Jaipur, this palace museum houses royal collections...
